name: Ben Woosley
description: I've been [contributing](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commits?author=Empact) and [reviewing](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues?q=mentions%3AEmpact) changes to Bitcoin Core and [Zap desktop wallet](https://github.com/LN-Zap/zap-desktop/commits?author=Empact) since 2017. I've also [articulated](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3q1d4QwjVjc) [Snowball](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/snowball-effort-bring-privacy-every-100000197.html), a bluetooth-based privacy-enhancing payjoin library for Bitcoin wallets. I'm currently starting up [Communion](https://communion.network/), the world's first Bitcoin cell service.
